job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Title: ML Engineer Duration: 6 Months Contract with extensions. Location: Remote   PLEASE NOTE: As per the client requirement, we need to perform 5 years background check (Criminal, Education, employment check & DMV). Please confirm if you have no records in the background and you will be able to clear the background check. Job Description: •	At least two years' experience as a machine learning engineer. •	Proficiency with Python, Java language •	Extensive knowledge of ML frameworks, libraries and software architecture. •	In-depth knowledge of mathematics, statistics, and algorithms. Knowledge of CI,CD tools , Kubernetes is a plus
